mission.text: Valderrama International School is an educational institution that forms integral, autonomous, and competent individuals capable of facing the challenges of the 21st century. We provide quality education that articulates the Montessori methodology with contemporary pedagogies, developing critical thinking skills, creativity, and global citizenship.

founded.title: Founded in 2025
founded.text1: Valderrama International School was born as a response to the need for contemporary, integral, and deeply human education in Colombia. We are an internationally-oriented school that conceives education as a transformative process.
founded.text2: We firmly believe that each student is unique, with their own talents, rhythms, and potential. We combine the pedagogical tradition of the Montessori method with contemporary methodologies such as Project-Based Learning (PBL), Blended Learning, and Holistic Education.
